author: mmartinec
msg: Bug 6681: NetAddr-IP version above 4.048 break sa-update - recommend avoiding versions 4.045 to 4.054

author: mgoulish
msg: I am removing DIGEST-MD5 from the mech list, because we cannot supply
a username+passwd in the sasldb file without introducing a security hole
So now the only mech is ANONYMOUS -- and lots of changes to the comments
to make it clear how to enable MD5 and how to add username+passwd for it.
Also, one of the broker options that was mentioned in the old text was

author: rgass
msg: Fix problem with hooks not executing because VM was in destroying state.  Either we remove this check as it was before or make sure we check for all possible cases as stated in the comments above.
